    • Constructor Detail

      • TextElement

        public TextElement(java.lang.String text)
        Constructor for this class. Before storing text to instance, all multiple white spaces are replaced with one white space - space. Moreover the tabs, CR and LF are replaced with space too.
        Parameters:
        text - without multiple white spaces in row

      • draw

        public Drawable.Point draw(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g,
                  int x,
                  int y)

        Draws the element.

        This is the most complicated draw method from all descendants of AElement.
        Method, using font size - concretely width for some string and height (=line height), draws the text:

        • when text has lower width as screen width it's OK and text is drawn at the box
        • if not, the character where it could be split is found findIndex(StringBuffer) and string is split
        • in last case when there is no character to split string, it's split at the position that fine for line or it's moved to next line

        Parameters:
        g - used for drawing
        x - horizontal coordinate where to start drawing
        x - vertical coordinate where to start drawing
        y - vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        new position where to start drawing of next Drawable
